NAME:
   withIntFlags - A new cli application

USAGE:
   withIntFlags [global options] command [command options] [arguments...]

COMMANDS:
   help, h  Shows a list of commands or help for one command

GLOBAL OPTIONS:
   --required value      (default: 0)
   --defaultValue value  (default: 42)
   --optional value      (default: 0)
   --help, -h            show help (default: false)
